mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_word_in (in_id, exhibit_id, exhibit_name, word_id, word, in_number, in_date, in_user) VALUES
(#{item.inId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.exhibitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.exhibitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.wordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.word,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.inUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
